name: Obsolism
latin_name: Novus Via Autem Satanas (New Way of Satan)
tenets: Complacency is regression in a society that moves forward.
Defer to scientific consensus, even when inconvenient or painful.
Be proactive, not reactive. Don't be blind to incoming change, instead strive to be on the right side of history.
Rehabilitate when possible. Provide your peers the opportunity to rescind and change their ways when in error.
One's time is their greatest resource and is not to be exploited.
Non-human life is valuable, and shall not be harmed unless avoiding such results in the equivalent harm of a human being.
Superstition is the drug of the impatiently curious.
